programme.title: John Glenn returns to Space
programme.short_synopsis: Remembering the televised spectacle of John Glenn, the first American to orbit the earth.
programme.medium_synopsis: As John Glenn, the first American to orbit the Earth prepares to return to space at the age of 77, Cooke remembers the extraordinary TV broadcast and Glenn's instant fame.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
display_title.subtitle: John Glenn returns to Space

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
